title: Assess Your Mental Clarity
description: Answer 8 questions honestly to understand your current stress and clarity levels

questions.question: How often do you feel overwhelmed by daily tasks?
How well are you able to focus on one task at a time?
How often do you feel mentally tired?
How calm do you feel during stressful situations?
How satisfied are you with your daily routine?
How often do you take time to pause and reflect?
How clear do you feel about your current goals?
How often do you feel emotionally balanced?

result_ranges.label: High Mental Clarity
result_ranges.message: You seem calm, focused, and emotionally balanced.

result_ranges.label: Moderate Stress
result_ranges.message: Some stress is present. Regular reflection and rest can help.

result_ranges.label: High Stress
result_ranges.message: You may be feeling overwhelmed. Consider meditation or professional support.
